title: Force Majeure
summary:
Clause 19                             Force Majeure
   Before inviting tenders, the Employer should verify that the wording of this Clause is compatible with
   the law governing the Contract.
fullText:
Clause 19                             Force Majeure
   Before inviting tenders, the Employer should verify that the wording of this Clause is compatible with
   the law governing the Contract.
